Nepal Climate Policy Workshop

Kathmandu, Nepal

The Nepal Climate Policy Workshop is a collaborative initiative designed to empower local communities to participate in climate policy development. This interactive workshop will bring together community leaders, local government representatives, climate experts, and youth activists to draft practical, community-level climate policy proposals that address Nepal's unique environmental challenges.

The workshop will feature facilitated discussions on climate adaptation strategies, renewable energy transitions, and sustainable agriculture practices specific to Nepal's diverse ecological regions. Participants will work in small groups to develop policy recommendations that will be compiled into a comprehensive report and submitted to relevant government ministries. The hybrid format allows for both in-person and virtual participation, ensuring broad representation from all seven provinces of Nepal.

Climate PolicyPublic EngagementSustainability

Registration Deadline: April 15, 2025
